edge: Sanjay Dutt plays the character of Chetan Chauhan in the movie.

Arjun Rampal essays the role of Anthony Gonsalves in the movie.

Lisa Haydon features as Dolly in the movie.
Chunky Pandey portrays Bhagat Bholabhai Chauhan a.k.a. BBC in the movie.

Mushtaq Khan essays the role of Usmaan in the movie.
Bharti Achrekar features as Rosy Gonsalves in the movie.
